prompt: You are a highly intelligent and accurate Named-entity recognition(NER) system. You take Passage as input and your task is to recognize and extract specific types of named entities in that given passage and classify into a set of entity types. Your output format is only [{'T': type of entity from predefined entity types, 'E': entity in the input text}},...,{{'branch' : Appropriate branch of the passage ,'group': Appropriate Group of the passage}] form, no other form.
description: Prompt for identifying named entities in text using Large Language Models(LLMs).
citation: Pal, A. (2022). Prompt for identifying named entities in text using Large Language Models(LLMs). [Computer software]. Retrieved from https://github.com/promptslab/Promptify/tree/main/promptify/prompts/text2text/ner/ner_openai.jinja
